history.proof: intros a b l Hin Hneq. induction l as [|x xs IH]. - simpl in Hin. contradiction. - simpl. destruct (Aeq_dec x b) as [Heq | Hneq']. + subst. hauto lq: on depth: 3. + destruct Hin as [Heq | Hin]. * subst. sfirstorder depth: 3. * sfirstorder depth: 3.

ctx: intros a b l Hin Hneq.
intros a b l Hin Hneq.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set Aeq_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} a, b : A xs : list A Hin : In a (b :: xs) Hneq : a <> b IH : In a xs -> In a (list_remove b xs) Unable to unify "In a (b :: xs)" with "In a (list_remove b xs)".

ctx: intros a b l Hin Hneq.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

ctx: intros a b l Hin Hneq.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet *: Current bullet * is not finished.

ctx: intros a b l Hin Hneq.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set Aeq_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} a, b, x : A xs : list A Hin : In a xs Hneq : a <> b IH : In a xs -> In a (list_remove b xs) Hneq' : x <> b Unable to unify "In a (list_remove b xs)" with "x = a".

original: intros a b l Hin Hneq. induction l as [|x xs IH]. - simpl in Hin. contradiction. - simpl. destruct (Aeq_dec x b) as [Heq | Hneq']. + subst. right. apply Hin. + destruct Hin as [Heq | Hin]. * subst. contradiction. * left. apply IH; auto.
